properties.name: The Brick Store
properties.notes: Rated #2 beer bar in the world by Beer Advocate magazine. Fantastic selection and good food. Limited outdoor seating available.

properties.name: Wrecking Bar
properties.notes: Solid house beers and great menu. Less crowded and noisy than some area bars on Fridays and Saturdays.

properties.name: Floataway Cafe
properties.notes: Best casual fine dining in Atlanta. Outdoor seating available. Dinner only.
properties.address: 1123 Zonolite Road NE Suite 15  Atlanta, GA 30306

properties.name: Atkins Park Restaurant
properties.notes: Worth a trip for the boiled peanuts alone. Outdoor seating available.
properties.address: 794 N Highland Avenue Northeast  Atlanta, GA 30306

properties.name: YEAH! Burger
properties.address: 1017 N Highland Avenue Northeast  Atlanta, GA 30306

properties.name: Porter Beer Bar
properties.notes: Like Brick Store, the Porter has an impressive selection of brews. The place is occasionally overcrowded, but has outdoor seating available.

properties.name: Cameli's
properties.notes: Good thin crust pizza in an intown strip mall.
properties.address: 699 Ponce De Leon Avenue NE # 12  Atlanta, GA 30308

properties.name: Antico Pizza
properties.notes: Excellent (but pricy) Neapolitan-style pizza near Georgia Tech. Crowded. BYOB OK.

properties.name: Bookhouse Pub
properties.notes: What's not to love about a Twin Peaks-themed bar in the Deep South? Cool interior, great beer selection (operated by the owner of the Porter), and a nice back patio.
properties.address: 736 Ponce De Leon Avenue Northeast  Atlanta, GA 30306

properties.name: Thali
properties.notes: Gujarati thali dinners and lunch buffet. A 10-15 minute drive from Emory.

properties.name: Hotel Saravana Bhavan
properties.notes: South Indian vegetarian, good choice for idli, dosas, etc. 15-20 minutes from Emory by car.

properties.name: Chat Patti
properties.notes: Inexpensive selection of Indian snacks and appetizers. Try the chole batura.
properties.address: 1594 Woodcliff Dr NE # F, Atlanta, GA, 30329
